casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Franklin PAGE. No. 239A96-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 10, 2004. Harvey A. Carpenter, IV, for Page. Valerie B. Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of February 2004 by Defendant for Stay of Execution:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of February 2004."
